caption: Pharmacokinetics of nifedipine in pregnant women
footnote: AUC0–12, area under the plasma concentration vs. time curve from time zero to 12 h; ClT/F, apparent total clearance; Cmax, peak concentration; Kel, elimination rate constant; tmax, time to reach maximum concentration; t½, elimination half‐life; T2DM, type 2 diabetes mellitus; Vd/F: apparent volume of distribution. Mann–Whitney test for paired data, P < 0.05
